ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 1am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. West wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
